casebody.data:
HOWELL
v.
N.C. WAYNE COUNTY DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES, et al. 326P15-5 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017

Burl Anderson Howell, For Howell, Burl Anderson.

Michael T. Wood, Special Deputy Attorney General, E.B. Borden Parker, Attorney at Law, Goldsboro, For N.C. Wayne County Department of Health and Human Services, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of February 2017 by Petitioner to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."
